title: Activity most suited for citizen science

content.question: Which of the following activities is most likely to be successful as a citizen science project?

choices.label: Collecting pictures of plants from around the world that can be analyzed to look for regional differences in plant growth.
Designing and building a robot to help with tasks in a medical laboratory.
Sorting scientific records and removing duplicate entries in a database with a large number of entries.
Using a simulation to predict the impact of a construction project on local animal populations.

content.answer: Collecting pictures of plants from around the world that can be analyzed to look for regional differences in plant growth.
